Can be extremely frustrating at some points but the game its self is really fun to play with mates. Would definitely recommend playing with a full 5 man team if you're going to play competitive. A good PC isn't necessarily required to run the game but its definitely crucial if you want to rank up past silver. Cheaters come and go every now and then but its rare to find one if you have a prime status.
Jogo competitivo e de sucesso. A anos o melhor jogo FPS do mundo. Provê muitas amizades bacanas
